products.title: Velvet Royal Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in royal blue, introduces a deep dark blue to your home.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Champagne - Roman Blind
products.description: Amaze your guests by featuring the lustre in a gorgeous champagne shade in your dcor for a sophisticated and voguish style. Here, a lavish blend of threads form a smooth, velvety cloth for a deluxe blind in an alluring rich shade of champagne and steely hue. Boost your magnolia dcor with glamorous style or simply add sumptuous fabric to an understated room, by including this creamy taupe shade with alike tones of mocha and caramel to create continuity, and similarly lustrous fabrics with graceful sheen for a plush finish.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: Adopt an elegant and sophisticated look with the lustre in ivory through its bountiful fabric and tempting, lustrous shade. A foundation of refined, velvety material with a smoky grey hue produces elegant style with a regal and inviting feel. Astound your guests by incorporating fulsome texture and rich colour, through harmonising the soothing ivory with cream, silver, and caramel hues to create a neutral and sophisticated base, adding alike fabrics and quilted florals for just a dash of creative charm.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Ruby - Roman Blind
products.description: In brightest pillarbox red, the lustre ruby offers a lush canvas of soft, velvety fabric, glossy and light-catching as it moves. Impossible to miss, this blind will provide a bold burst of colour, livening up any space in which it's hung. The traditionally textured ruby can be used even in modern decor schemes. Team it with stark white walls and ebony black furnishings for a luxurious take on monochromatic minimalism.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Steel - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate an indulgent and contemporary space by adding the lustre in steel, a roman blind made from a lavish, velvety thread to form a dramatic look with sumptuous fabrics in smoky silver with blue hues and a modern metallic sheen. Include the regal steel in a subtle white and grey bedroom for a cultured and classy theme, adding blends of plush, textured fabrics and cotton-fresh linens for an inviting finish.
